post.body: Working on website. As I update will b adding a Birkie blog along with number of new things. Once jazzed up, will add it 2 my profile here.
Warm tomorrow but will be turning cold with chance in the week for snow. Friends seem 2 b dropping out of Birkie, but I'm still committed.
Got another 14 day pass to a gym- will try to make most of it. I'm feeling all Pillsbury boyish from inactivity: Need to work that off.
Perfect snow packing day 2day: Started turning my grandson's snowfort in2 an igloo. Melting also gave me chance 2 do final clearing of drive
MapMyRun.com: Completed maintain run. 217 (kcal). 2.00 mi.. 00:25:30
Just saw a feature on abc about Mark Covert who's run every day since July 1968. http://www.runeveryday.com/lists/RunningStreakList.htm
Looks like skiing is out. Called friend & confirmed he felt the same. Probably will have 2 do mundane exercise in basement or run in rain.
Wife not feeling well. I'm doing cleaning around house & constantly checking basement 4 h2o. All that snow melting under rain & warm temps.
Wife & me feeling like we have holiday hangovers- no ambition at all. Did chop some humongous ice chunks out of gutters & folded laundry.
This morning I'm going through all my unlabeled CD backups to see what's on them. Couldn't sleep this morning: Got up at 6am.
Christmas day-nice. Made french toast brulé 4 Wife & gave massage. Went over 2 folks 2 help Mom set up food assortment. Back home at 9pm
Christmas day- nice. Made french toast brulé 4 wife & gave her massage. Went over 2 folks 2 help Mom set up food assortment. Bck home at 9pm
Off 2 church: Wish it had midnight mass or option other than 8am. Afterall, kids grown and gone. Got pez collection of all star trek figures
Hope everyone has a joyous holiday. Wishing all well.
Won't be exercising until Saturday when I go out skiing again. (Except for shoveling of course!) Wife and I finish baking last of cookies
Roads were bad on way to skiing at 2pm but warmer temperatures fixed roads for drive back around 5-6pm
Beautiful conditions at Lapham 4 skiing. The classical trails were wiped out but easy 2 make own in light powder. Groomers passed us twice
MapMyRun.com: Completed Cross Country Ski. 1,257 (kcal). 02:00:00
Meeting sister for joint workout, but first we both have to dig out.
More monotonous tweets. Snow, Snow, Snow, Snow, Snow, Snow, Snow, Snow, unlimitous snow, unlimitous snow (Sung 2 the spam song)
